attributes.action: Ask for the resignation of all party members associated with or recruited by the Islamic Forum of Europe.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is quite clear from a recent television documentary broadcast by Channel 4 on March 1st 2010 at 8.00p.m., that the Islamic Forum of Europe has 'a controversial social and political agenda.'
The documentary outlined the alarming fact that this fundamentalist Muslim group are posing as Labour Party candidates and helping to elect their own I.F.E. members to take office in positions of authority.
We would hope that due to the discrimination outlined by 'Dispatches: Britain's Islamic Republic' toward other ethnic minorities within the area the I.F.E. operate, the Labour Party would break all ties with the I.F.E. by dismissing it's I.F.E. linked members.
We also wish to see a public statement which confirms that the Labour Party does not support Muslim fundamentalists within it's ranks.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the Labour Party.
